content.text:
Any use permitted in Residence AA District, excluding
the office, studio or occupational room of a professional person,
notwithstanding that said professional person may reside upon said
premises.

The building area shall not exceed 20% of the
lot area.

There shall be a required front yard which shall
be not less than 35 feet in depth.

There shall be two side yards, one on each side
of the main building. Each side yard shall not be less than 15 feet
wide.

There shall be a required rear yard which shall
have a minimum depth of 35 feet.

No principal building and accessory buildings
shall be erected upon a lot that has a street frontage and minimum
lot width at the front and rear wall of the principal building of
less than 100 feet and a lot area of less than 12,500 square feet.

No building shall be greater than 2 1/2
stories nor more than 35 feet in height.
